      • createXMLMapping

        public static Element createXMLMapping(lucee.runtime.PageContext pc,
                                       lucee.runtime.db.DatasourceConnection dc,
                                       lucee.runtime.Component cfc,
                                       SessionFactoryData data)
                                throws lucee.runtime.exp.PageException
        Generate an XML node tree defining a Hibernate mapping for the given Component
        Parameters:
        pc - Lucee PageContext object
        dc - Lucee DatasourceConnection object
        cfc - Lucee Component to create the mapping XML for
        data - SessionFactoryData instance to pull Hibernate metadata from
        Returns:
        XML root node
        Throws:
        lucee.runtime.exp.PageException

      • toMappingString

        public static String toMappingString(Element document)
                              throws lucee.runtime.exp.PageException
        Convert the document to a file-ready XML string.

        Will prepend the XML head tags.

        Parameters:
        document - The W3C document root element for converting to an XML string
        Returns:
        a fully-formed HBM XML document ready to save to a file.
        Throws:
        lucee.runtime.exp.PageException

      • saveMapping

        public static void saveMapping(lucee.runtime.Component cfc,
                               String xml)
        Save the XML dom to a hibernate mapping file (myEntity.hbm.xml)
        Parameters:
        cfc - Lucee Component (entity) that we're saving the mapping for
        xml - Fully-formed hibernate mapping XML

      • loadMapping

        public static String loadMapping(lucee.runtime.Component cfc)
                          throws lucee.runtime.exp.PageException,
                                 IOException
        Get the hibernate mapping XML as a string.
        Parameters:
        cfc - Lucee Component (entity) for which to load the HBM mapping xml file
        Returns:
        A giant XML string
        Throws:
        lucee.runtime.exp.PageException
        IOException

      • getMappingLastModified

        public static long getMappingLastModified(lucee.runtime.Component cfc)
        Get the last modified time for this component's mapping. Will return 0 if no mapping found.
        Parameters:
        cfc - The Lucee component (persistent entity) we're pulling the modification date for
        Returns:
        A long value representing the time the file was last modified, measured in milliseconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970), or 0L if the file does not exist or if an I/O error occurs
        See Also:
        Resource.lastModified();

      • getMappingResource

        public static lucee.commons.io.res.Resource getMappingResource(lucee.runtime.Component cfc)
        Get the HBM mapping file ( i.e. `models/myEntity.hbm.xml`) for this persistent Component/entity.
        Parameters:
        cfc - Lucee Component
        Returns:
        Lucee Resource, i.e. a Lucee-fied File object

      • getXMLOpen

        public static String getXMLOpen()
        Get the opening of a Hibernate mapping XML file, including tag and DOCTYPE declaration

      • stripXMLOpenClose

        public static String stripXMLOpenClose(String xml)
        Strip the open/close tags (i.e. ``, ``, ``) from an hbm.xml file.

        Useful for assembling multiple entities into a single `` element for sending to Hibernate.

        Parameters:
        xml - XML string from which to strip open and close tags
        Returns:
        an XML string with the DOCTYPE, `` and `` elements removed
